main event: An observer on moonwatch duty in Plymouth, North Carolina, reported seeing a white object that appeared to explode in the sky on January 10, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as glowing and about 35 inches in diameter,Observers reported that it could stop and change directions rapidly,Some boys from Fort Bragg saw the same object and called it a freight train car,The object was initially considered more likely a meteorite due to inconclusive information,The report involved multiple pages and communications with various Air Force officials.
witness description: observers on moonwatch duty and boys from Fort Bragg
